results.overview: The small city of Tarker's Mill is startled by a series of sadistic murders. The population fears that this is the work of a maniac. During a search a mysterious, hairy creature is observed. This strange appearance is noticed once a month. People lock themselves up at night, but there's one boy who's still outside, he's preparing the barbecue.
results.title: Silver Bullet

results.overview: A cowboy heads for the town where his father was murdered to find out who was responsible.
results.title: The Silver Bullet

results.overview: Tom Henderson is made Sheriff of Chico to fight Slim Walker's gang. Unknown to Tom, banker Luke Hargrave is the gang's real boss. Dad Kane is looking for the man that blinded him whom he can remember by his voice. He finds him when the gang robs the bank and Tom chases them down.
results.title: The Silver Bullet

results.overview: Oz Academy 2021.04.04 event in Korauken Hall, Tokyo
results.title: OZ Academy Silver Bullet

results.original_title: Bob Seger and The Silver Bullet Band: All Time Rock'N'Roll
results.title: Bob Seger and The Silver Bullet Band: All Time Rock'N'Roll

results.original_title: Bob Seger and The Silver Bullet Band - Live at Capital Center Largo MD
results.overview: Bob Seger, and his band, The Silver Bullet Band, performed in  1980, at the Capital Center, in Largo, MD. Bob rocks and plays his  greatest hits. The only known pro-shot show from Detroit's rock legend Bob Seger & the Silver Bullet Band.  This show was recorded over 30 years ago during his 1980's "Against the Wind" tour.
results.title: Bob Seger and The Silver Bullet Band - Live at Capital Center Largo MD

results.overview: An actress and her filmmaker boyfriend experience turbulence in their relationship when she accepts a role in a werewolf film.
results.title: Silver Bullets
